Name: LG - Worst AC Installation
Review_Description__c: Flipkart AC Installation Technician: AC Installation Guy came before Installation date, that sounds good. But he made worst Installation, drilled three time to correct AC Position in Center. When I ask them pull the pipe on roof from side of the wall. He said that he cannot do that. Even extra holes on wall, ask them, who will fill the hole on wall, guy said that not part of installation..

Name: Fabulous!
Review_Description__c:
Great deal, value for money, Thanks Flipkart & Thanks LG 

I got the best price Rs 40700/- for this LG AC JSQ19HUZD 1.5 Ton 5 Star during Big Billion day of Flipkart. 
AC comes at schedule delivery date & time with good packaging. 
Best thing was installation by LG; installation done before scheduled date as LG is fast & service is reliable. Itâ€™s very good LG took only 499/- for installation & additional 830/- for given accessories. 
Demo given by LG service person was good & helpful. 
After using my product for 2-5 days Iâ€™m impressed with this LG Ac as it comes with very good features such as Himalaya Cool, Comfort Air, Fan Speed Mode, Active energy control, Sleep Mode, Sleep Timer, dehumidifier etc & having very good built quality product with happy to mention itâ€™s pure noiseless!!!
As shown on LG website regarding this product itâ€™s really reliable & energy Efficient with dual inverter tech & more than basic features. 
Economic too...

Proâ€™s - 
Himalaya Cooling 
4 Way swing 
Dual inverter compressor 
Noiseless operation of both In/Out unit
5 Star 
100% Copper 
Active Energy control Mode 
Dust & anti-bacteria n 3M filter 
Sleep mode 
Sleep timer 
Room temperature on remote 
Stabiliser free 
Auto clean 

Conâ€™s-
No Wifi 
Remote buttons missing Night Glow feature 

Thanks Flipkart & Thanks LG.

records.Name: REMOTE BUTTONS MISSING NIGHT GLOW FEATURE

Name: Worst experience ever!
Review_Description__c:
One of the worst product and service.  AC delivered on 31 Jan 2021 .  Installation Charge claimed be by was around 5000 ( Includes outdoor unit ) . Since then it is continuously giving problems. Due to some leakage issues, it didn't work . So far we used the AC only 
2 times and LG technical team is not able to fix the issues. So in a nutshell, LG team couldnt fix the cooling problem since 31 Jan 2021.
Now AC is just a showpiece for me . 

Better go for some other brands .

Name: Don't waste your money
Review_Description__c: Its been three days i have purchased the product but no supportive efforts were made by LG to install it. Rather I made number of calls, mails, raises concerns on flipkart and through Whatsapp but they made no response of it. I purchased many LG products but never seen such cruel behavior towards customers from any of company. I am not aware about product efficiency and it's working till it's installation, but keeping product without any hope of it's installation/demo is much horrible.

Ac also working efficiently till now. will update the performance after a usage of two months.

More noise and faster cooling and it has only two way swing.. Flipkart is promoting this product as 4way swing which is absolutely wrong.  

Ac outdoor unit is very worst part make too much loud noise.. 
Compressor noise is very horrible like a small generator sound
Not suitable for scalm n silent areas.. Technician are very poor they are not able to figure out why these much noise from outdoor unit, no one is able to fix this issue.. 
Very bad experience from a reputed brand LG.

Name: Highly recommended
Review_Description__c:
The AC is an excellent product no doubt about that. Got a good deal at the time so purchased it. Does the job well. 

The only issue I faced was with the installation people. I found the gentlemen to be very rude who came to the house to install the AC. Flipkart might wanna do something about that since it isn't only me who faced this issue. 

One more thing: The people who came to deliver the AC came at around 2030hrs at night and they didn't even deliver it to my doorstep. Didn't look like some flipkart professional. I had to carry the AC to the third floor with the help of my neighbour. It was pathetic. 

I could have given a 2 easily for the product but again it would have been a biased review.

Name: Very Good
Review_Description__c:
Pros: -
* Cooling is Great. 
* Indoor unit is very quiet, outdoor unit fan makes the usual noise. 

Cons: -
* Remote is generic and some features on the remote might not work for you depending on the model. 

Notes: -
* If you have a concrete wall and you need to dig a hole be ready to shell out extra anywhere between 2k to 5k depending on the thickness of the wall. 
* Installation will be quicker if you directly reach out to LG after product is delivered to you rather than waiting for flipkart to arrange it for  you.

Name: Perfect product!
Review_Description__c: Good

Name: Best in the market!
Review_Description__c: I waited for one month to understand all apsects. All promised features are working and delivery was good (considering the delivery address to be a remote area in at eastern india). Product is good. For new buyers in doubt, let me tell you I was experiencing the same fear whether to trust ecommerce for high value home appliances or not. Also during my time the average rating was below 2 amd only one negative review was there. No positive review. But I recieved a good one and thanks to flipkart for the discount.

Name: Best in the market!
Review_Description__c: Good products

Name: Wonderful
Review_Description__c: The product seems to be great. very nice product, stylish. On time delivery by Flipkart. Order was placed on 13th of May and was delivered on 15th of May. Installation was done by LG service centre technicians by 17th of May. They took an amount of Rs 1,905( including Rs  499 and some other rates of drilling and the shelf brackets. Also with their fees which was not mentioned on the bill provided by LG.) The AC runs well in our old type of house. It takes 25-30 minutes to cool the entire room of 161 sqft. First after opening the Ac will run at it's lowest of 18 degrees. Himalaya Cool is also a good option for faster cooling which must be switched after 5 minutes of running the Ac at 18. The outdoor Unit was too heavy compared to other Acs. It must have had been because of the Dual Inverter compressor. The indoor unit is quiet during operation compared to other ACs. Overall the product is very good. On time delivery by Flipkart. Polite service by LG technicians. A good value for money alternative in the conditions of kolkata instead of Voltas, carrier and all.

Name: Disappointed with the installation.. YMMV
Review_Description__c:
Ok, here is the catch.. i bought it when the ad said 500rs for standard installation. looks like, so called "standard installation"  covers only 3 meters. In my case i had to go for extra 3 meters, so i ended up paying 3900Rs.. jut to fit the AC..  stand 750rs, service charge 750rs per meter, pipe cover fitting, stand fitting, and then regular installation fee blah blah.. so i felt they ripped me off.. 

bottom line, check the stores near you, they do this for free..

Quality wise, i just bought it and yet to find out.. hence the 2 stars.

Name: Ok Product, Bad service
Review_Description__c: The product is ok. The service is pathetic. I had two technician from LG who came to fix the AC. They neither are well trained nor professional. The missed to put the washers and drilled multiples holes and charged around INR 2900. LG is a multinational brand needs to have some decent guys working. irrespective of how good the product is the overall experience become worst.

Name: Highly recommended
Review_Description__c: Nice ac thanks flipkart

Name: Good AC
Review_Description__c:
Another good product from LG.

1. Fast cooling  - 10 minutes to cool medium size room.
2.  (indoor unit) Awesome noise control - barely you hear noise even if you set fan speed  high.
3. Need more air flow for long range. Swing is good enough for small room but not good medium size room.
4. Normal AC stabilizer is more than enough.
5. Good features, less power consumption - go for it if you are usage is more than 7 hrs a day.

Overall it's good.

After 6 month usage

Flipkart needs to give more information guide about installation and charges.
